enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: The compliance drafting group met in an afternoon session to consider the outstanding issues requiring redrafting, as identified in the negotiating group, with the exception of consequences.
Delegates reportedly made little progress, with only a few drafting points cleared.
The drafting group also met in a late afternoon session to discuss an EU alternative proposal for the draft COP-7 decision.
